name: Destest_heat_demand.csv
title: Data Heat Demand Annex 60 Neighborhood Case
description: The total heat demand is given (in W) for all 24 buildings in a timestep of 900s for one year, taking into account Uccle weather conditions and fixed setpoint temperature of 21 degrees (no internal gains). The attics are assumed unheated, so the given demand is the sum for day- and night-zones, or all apartments. Numbering of buildings follows the node numbering, as given in the specification document, Figure 1. The data is provided in one file (first column is time, others represent the buildings in order 1 to 24).

context.contact: Michael Wetter MWetter@lbl.gov, Christoph van Treeck treeck@e3d.rwth-aachen.de

sources.title: KU Leuven
sources.description: The profiles were generated from detailed building simulations implemented at the KU Leuven, using the '10. Activity 2.2: Design of District Energy Systems' description and the IDEAS Modelica library

_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
